articles.title: Trump says Microsoft to make changes to curb data center power costs for Americans
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday that Microsoft will make "major changes" this week to ensure U.S. consumers do not pay more for electricity because of data centers' power consumption, and his administration was working with other technology companies on the issue of high utility bills.
articles.content: Jan 12 (Reuters) - U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday that Microsoft (MSFT.O), opens new tab will make "major changes" this week to ensure U.S. consumers do not pay more for electricity because of data centers' power consumption, and his admi... [474 chars]

articles.title: Silver Touch Technologies Secures National Digital Transformation Platform Project
articles.description: Silver Touch Technologies Limited has secured a national digital transformation platform project, representing a significant business milestone. This project win showcases the company's capabilities in digital transformation services and strengthens its position in the technology sector, potentially contributing positively to its revenue pipeline and growth prospects.
articles.content:
Silver Touch Technologies Limited has successfully secured a national digital transformation platform project, marking a significant business achievement for the technology services company.

articles.title: Creating non-consensual sexual images to become illegal amid Grok AI backlash
articles.description: The Department for Science, Innovation and Technology did not specify which day it would come into effect.
articles.content:
Generating sexual images without consent is set to become illegal as the Government ramps up its response to AI chatbot Grok.
It comes as watchdog Ofcom has launched an investigation into whether social media platform X has breached UK law over repor... [2273 chars]

articles.title: Creating non-consensual sexual images to become illegal amid Grok AI backlash
articles.description: The Department for Science, Innovation and Technology did not specify which day it would come into effect.
articles.content:
It comes as watchdog Ofcom has launched an investigation into whether social media platform X has breached UK law over reports that Grok had been used to create “undressed images”.
Technology Secretary Liz Kendall said the criminal offence would be b... [2147 chars]
